thread.title: Brooklyn Flea and Smorgasburg Open in Sunset Park This Weekend
thread.title_full: Brooklyn Flea and Smorgasburg Open in Sunset Park This Weekend

title: Brooklyn Flea and Smorgasburg Open in Sunset Park This Weekend
text:
Brooklyn Flea and Smorgasburg Open in Sunset Park This Weekend By Nikhita Venugopal | October 16, 2015 6:11pm smorgasburg.com 
SUNSET PARK â€” Brooklyn's favorite artisanal markets are back. 
Smorgasburg and Brooklyn Flea open in Sunset Park this weekend for their six-month winter residency in Industry City. 
Dozens of vendors will be selling food, clothes, handmade wares and antiques in a 50,000 square-foot space of the second floor at 241 37th St. 
The food and shopping markets will be open from 11 a.m. to 6 p.m. every weekend until March 27, 2016. 
Here's the full list of vendors for Brooklyn Flea and Smorgasburg .
